import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Nav, Navbar, NavDropdown, Form, FormControl, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import * as categoryService from '../../services/categoryService' const Header = () => { let [categories, setCategories] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { categoryService.getForNavigation() .then(res => setCategories(res)); }, []) let categoriesItems = categories.map((category) => {category.name} ) return (
